arts.ttl: Barca’s inability to see out games is harming the Flick revolution
arts.sum: 4 - No team has dropped more points from winning positions than FC Barcelona in LaLiga since the start of November 2024 (4, the same as Osasuna). After starting the 2024/25 La Liga season like a steam train, Barcelona have hit a bumpy patch that’s seen them drop points against Real Sociedad, Celta Vigo, Las Palmas and now Real Betis.

arts.ttl: Flick sent off for protesting penalty in Barcelona draw at Betis
arts.sum: Coach Hansi Flick was sent off for protesting a penalty decision and Barcelona was held at Real Betis to 2-2 in La Liga on Saturday. Flick showed his frustration over a decision to send Betis to the spot, but he also said after the match that his youthful team, which included two 17-year-old starters, must improve.

arts.ttl: ‘We have to change’ - Flick delivers verdict on Barca’s draw
arts.sum: The German warned his side they were “too slow” and “relied on long balls” at the Benito Villamarin and wants more quality from his players. “It wasn’t a really good game but we have a young team and we must improve a lot.

arts.ttl: €100m Gyokeres BID, Barcelona CLOSE to signing, Trent to CITY?
arts.sum: With the January transfer window just a matter of weeks away, things are starting to heat up, with Viktor Gyokeres set to be the subject of a sensational offer, Barcelona closing in on their first signing of 2025 and a stunning Trent Alexander-Arnold rumour. €100m Gyokeres BID, Barcelona CLOSE to signing, Trent to CITY?

arts.ttl: Jude Bellingham Closes the Gap to Barcelona: Things We Learned From Girona 0–3 Real Madrid
arts.sum: Jude Bellingham carried Real Madrid to a decisive victory over Girona, closing the gap to Barcelona atop the table.
